World Bank Open Data – Indicators API
access_method: Direct API (open, no key required); JSON or XML responses
frequency: Monthly for many series (WDI quarterly/annually per indicator release); continuous as data published

name: IMF Data (SDMX/IFS, Article IV)
access_method: API for structured data (SDMX/XML/JSON – some datasets require registration); PDFs for Article IV and country reports
frequency: Quarterly for most IMF datasets (some monthly series); Article IV reports annually or biennially

name: UN Comtrade (Trade Statistics)
access_method: Direct API (JSON or CSV); free for moderate use; registration needed for heavy use; bulk downloads available
frequency: Monthly/annual – updated as countries report (mirror data for Yemen due to limited reporting)

name: ILOSTAT (Labor & Employment)
access_method: REST API (JSON/CSV) with API key; bulk downloads available
frequency: Annual; some modeled estimates more frequent

name: UNOCHA Financial Tracking Service (FTS)
access_method: REST API (JSON) – no key needed; filter by country, year, appeal

name: IATI (International Aid Transparency Initiati
access_method: REST API and bulk CSV exports; no auth
frequency: Continuous – organizations publish updates on their schedule; datastore updates daily or weekly

name: ReliefWeb API (Reports)
access_method: REST API – no key (app name parameter for usage tracking)

name: Population & Displacement (UNHCR/IOM)
access_method: UNHCR API (open, no auth) for refugee/IDP counts; IOM DTM datasets via reports/CSV (manual)
frequency: UNHCR annual; IOM DTM quarterly or as needed

name: ACLED (Armed Conflict Location & Event Data)
access_method: REST API with token or bulk CSV downloads (license required)

name: UCDP (Uppsala Conflict Data Program)
frequency: Annual version releases (data up to previous year)

name: Sanctions & Compliance Lists (UN, OFAC, EU/UK
frequency: Ad‑hoc (whenever designations change); OFAC daily; EU/UK as needed

name: UNCTADstat (Trade & Development)
access_method: Manual/semi-automated CSV/Excel download; registration may be required for bulk files

name: FAO – FAOSTAT & Food Security
access_method: Bulk download (CSV/Excel) – no API; bulletins (PDF) for food price monitoring
frequency: Annual for production indices; periodic (monthly/quarterly) for price monitoring

name: UNDP/UNICEF/WFP/OCHA Public Data & Reports
access_method: Documents (PDFs) and small datasets; some via HDX; manual or semi-automated ingestion
frequency: Occasional – e.g. UNDP bulletins quarterly, UNICEF updates annually, WFP VAM price bulletins monthly, OCHA HNO/HRP annually

name: WFP Yemen Market & Price Monitoring
access_method: PDF bulletins and CSV/Excel datasets; WFP price API if available; manual ingestion
frequency: Monthly bulletins (4–6 week lag); possibly bi‑weekly raw price data

name: Fuel Price Bulletins & Partner Feeds
access_method: Manual ingestion – PDF bulletins, social media announcements, partner-provided files
frequency: Ad‑hoc (whenever price changes); clusters track monthly

name: Yemen Data Project (Airstrikes)
access_method: Manual ingestion from monthly reports and media releases

name: Central Bank of Yemen – Aden & Sana’a
access_method: Manual ingestion – scrape CBY Aden auction data, bulletins; glean Sana’a data from reports/leaks/news; partner feeds
frequency: Aden: weekly FX auction results; monthly/quarterly bulletins; annual financial statements. Sana’a: irregular data via budget docs or news; circulars occasionally

name: Yemen Ministry of Finance / Ministry of Plann
access_method: Manual document ingestion (PDFs, Excel); partner-provided copies; speech extracts
frequency: GoY budgets irregular (e.g. 2019, 2021); execution reports rarely; Sana’a budgets undisclosed; MoPIC plans occasional; CSO yearbooks up to 2014 and limited later estimates

name: Social Fund for Development (SFD)
access_method: Document ingestion; partner data sharing via CSV/excel; IATI feed if available
frequency: Annual reports; continuous updates in internal MIS (not public)

name: Yemen Microfinance Network (YMN)
access_method: PDF reports; partner data sharing (no API)

name: Private Sector & Chambers of Commerce
access_method: Surveys/reports from chambers; customs data via chamber if shared

name: Remote Sensing (Night Lights – VIIRS)
access_method: Bulk file download (GeoTIFF); processing to extract indices; possible use of Google Earth Engine
